snippet.title: Tiny Heroes Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Tiny Heroes, the amazing dungeon defense game from Simutronics and the creator of geoDefense.  Now Available in the iPhone App Store!

Tiny Heroes (released September 2011) is a tower defense game for the iPhone, by award-winning game developer David Whatley, creator of Game of the Year geoDefense!

http://tinyheroes.com
